Vildred.tooltip: Increases basic Speed of other allies, and when the enemy is defeated, launches an extra attack.

Charlotte.tooltip: When attacked, increases Attack and Defense of the caster, and deals great AoE damage to enemies every turn.

Kayron.tooltip: Becomes stronger as the caster's Health gets lower, and upon receiving lethal damage, the caster does not die for 1 turn.

Straze.tooltip: Attacks all enemies, dealing devastating damage to the enemy with the highest max Health.

Krau.tooltip: Increase Defense of all allies and provokes enemy to protect allies.

Violet.tooltip: Has high chance to evade enemy attakcs, and when successfully evading, counterattacks the target.
